summary: Mechanical Engineering graduate seeking opportunity that will utilize my skills in Mechanical Design, Manufacturing Processes, DOE and Project Management. Skilled in CAD, GD&T, Analysis & Simulation, Quality Control, and Maintenance.
skills: PFMEA (Process Failure Mode and Effects Analysis)

experience.title: Maintenance Engineering Co-Op
experience.description: Functioned as CMMS technical expert; liaison to Global IT and Maximo Support; managed Maximo workflows; resolved Maximo 7.6 issues; expanded facility Maximo users by 50% and enabled 1000+ global users; provided problem-solving support and training; created, assigned and scheduled Preventive and Predictive Maintenance plans; performed PFMEA using downtime trends; champion for Spindle Vibration Analysis; trained tradesmen to collect and analyze vibration data; implemented 5S in toolroom; performed GP-12 quality inspection in PPAP; investigated part failures by studying electrical, hydraulic and pneumatic prints using AutoCAD; planned maintenance with Production to minimize downtime; identified and coordinated purchase of new/obsolete parts using Oracle.

experience.title: Student Team Leader
experience.description: Raised $5,000+ for student scholarships; coached fundraising techniques to 15 Student Ambassadors.

experience.title: Mechanical Intern
experience.description: Fixed design errors considering design parameters of vehicle transmission unit using SolidWorks; registered data for FMEA and BOM; assisted Continuous Improvement team in reviewing and refining processes; generated in-depth Root Cause Analysis reports.

experience.title: Manufacturing Intern
experience.description: Utilised GD&T and Unigraphics NX to identify and fix measurement and design errors; analysed models using ANSYS; implemented Lean Manufacturing and reduced waste by 5%; performed geometric and algebraic calculations on CNC machines.

education.degree: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Automotive Engineering
education.school: Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, Visvesvaraya Technological University
